subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Hofstra used a barrage of 3-pointers, hitting 11 of 20 from beyond the arc, to defeat Georgia State, 76-63, Wednesday night in Atlanta.
snippet: Hofstra used a barrage of 3-pointers, hitting 11 of 20 from beyond the arc, to defeat Georgia State, 76-63, Wednesday night in Atlanta.
